name: Prof. Jai Prakash Saini
message: It is my privilege to invite all of you to Abhyudaya, the annual art, cultural, and literary fest of Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology. With over 40 events, it provides a vibrant platform for students to showcase their creativity in dance, music, theater, painting, literature, and more. This yearâ€™s theme, Enigmatic Ensemble, celebrates the fusion of diverse artistic expressions into a harmonious whole. I encourage you to participate with enthusiasm and make Abhyudaya '25 a truly unforgettable experience.
